dcterms:creator: Samuel Bowman
Gabor Angeli
Christopher Potts
Christopher D Manning
dcterms:description: A large annotated corpus for learning natural language inference, used to evaluate the performance of the polarized-VAE model in disentangling semantics and syntax.
dcterms:title: Stanford Natural Language Inference dataset (SNLI)

dcterms:creator: Kishore Papineni
Salim Roukos
Todd Ward
Wei-Jing Zhu
dcterms:description: A method for automatic evaluation of machine translation, used as a metric to evaluate the reconstruction quality of generated sentences.
dcterms:title: BLEU

dcterms:creator: Kaizhong Zhang
Dennis E. Shasha
dcterms:description: A metric for measuring the editing distance between trees, used to evaluate syntactic similarity in generated sentences.
dcterms:title: Tree Edit Distance (TED)
